short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add TODO items from issue comments in GitHub Enterprise

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
OctoAudit (Enterprise) is a browser extension that allows you to add TODO items from a
GitHub (Enterprise) issue/pull request's comments into its summary.

I'm a fan of Review Board and was disappointed that GitHub (Enterprise) didn't have the equivalent of code review issue tracking, so I decided to make a simple version of it using Markdown and a browser extension.
